# What is the MVP Application?
The Galaxy-based **MVP (Multi-omics Visualization Platform)** plugin enables interactive exploration of results produced from workflows integrating genomic sequencing data with mass spectrometry (MS)-based proteomics dataâ€”an approach commonly referred to as **proteogenomics**.
MVP is a multi-functional visualization tool designed to:
- Organize and filter large, complex datasets - Assess the quality of tandem mass spectrometry (MS/MS) data matched to peptide sequences - Visualize data at both the **protein** and **gene** levels
With a user-friendly interface, researchers can filter and sort through large datasets with just a few keystrokes to isolate relevant findings.
